question: Begum Hazrat Mahal led the revolt from which of the following places during 1857 revolt?
explanation: Important leaders of the revolt of 1857 and corresponding places are Delhi- Bahadur Shah II and General Bakht Khan. Kanpur- Nana Sahib, Tantia Tope, Rao Sahib, Tantia Tope, Azimullah Khan. Lucknow- Begum Hazrat Mahal, Birjis Qadir, Ahmadullah. Jhansi- Rani Laxmibai. Bihar- Kunwar Singh. Allahabad- Maulvi Liyakat Ali. Bareilly- Khan Bahadur Khan. Faizabad- Maulvi Ahmadullah.
